title: Edificio Vincent
description: 101-Unit Apartment Building with apartments ranging from 40-110 meters squared, within walking distance to stores, theaters, restaurants, and plazas.

title: Edificio Dalí
description: 45-Unit Apartment Building with high-end finishes, indoor and outdoor swimming pools, and a children's playground.

title: Edificio Orquídeas
description: 40-Unit Residential Apartments steps away from Colon Metro Station with swimming pool and patios.
